channel.title: [Real Quick Question!] Need Help ASAP!
channel.description: Ok so I made a client.jar for my webclient but I ended up deleting my clients folders a while ago and I cant seem to recover them so does anyone know how I can change a client.jar IP adress? Because Ive tryed extracting the client.jar with winrar then editing the IP from 0.0.0.0 to my IP but when I save it then jar the file agen and try run it the client doesnt load.. so how can I change the ip adress in a client.jar????

item.title: [Real Quick Question!] Need Help ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @Eclipsedz Eclipsedz
